author: kraai
msg: (SVN_LIB_BERKELEY_DB): Convert sed commands to basic regular

author: naked
msg: Generalized the INT_ERR macro used in svnadmin, svnserve and svnlook

author: sussman
msg: Continuation of issue #899:  missing, scheduled-add directories are
obstruction to updates too, just like missing, scheduled-add files.
[Yes, I'll be writing regression tests for all these wc buglets.]
* update_editor.c (add_directory): make sure that a missing,
scheduled-add directory isn't in the way.  that's an obstruction.

author: naked
msg: Prevent using '..' in URLs to go below given root path in
svnserve. Also fix UTF-8 translation for root path. Also make given
root path absolute before using it since apr_proc_detach changes the
combine root path with client path.
(find_repos): Do UTF-8 translation before and after apr_filepath_merge.
(main): Make root path absolute before detaching.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/todo: Removed note in security about '..'.

author: cmpilato
msg: add some stuff to the svn:ignore property
